comments:
Reason:
     Index out of bounds


If I work the whole day with eclipse, at some point I get this error. It happens
when I press CTRL-x whith some lines of text selected (>5). After that the text
I've selected is gone and doesn't come back with CTRL-z. You have to open the
file in an other program to get the selected text back.

Further I use the eclipseME plugin, but I don't think that is important.

Eclipse: Version: 3.0.2
Build id: 200503110845
